The Area

Accommodation

Atholl Palace Hotel
01796 472 005

Stay at the venue itself with lodges and rooms available

  • Free parking

  • Leisure Facilities

  • Bar and Restaurant

  • Spa Facilities
Fisher's Hotel
01796 472 000

Sister hotel to the Atholl Palace.

  • Free parking

  • Leisure Facilities

  • Bar and Restaurant

  • Spa Facilities
Fonab Pitlochry
01796 472 882

Milton of Fonab is a quiet, family run, Caravan Park on the south side of Pitlochry next to the River Tummel.

  • Free parking

  • Leisure Facilities

  • Bar and Restaurant

  • Spa Facilities

Things to do

Blair Athol Distillery
01796 482 003

lair Athol’s ancient source of water – the Allt Dour – flows through the grounds from the slopes of Ben Vrackie, contributing to the whisky’s, mellow quality and smooth finish.
The Enchanted Forest

Set amidst the stunning Autumn woodland of Forestry Commission Scotland’s Faskally Wood in Highland Perthshire, The Enchanted Forest is Scotland’s premier sound and light event.
Pitlochry Golf Course
01796 472 334

Pitlochry Golf is one of the finest inland golfing facilities in Scotland
